message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its value and the potential it holds for enhancing your processes, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This offer is tailored to maximize the return on your investment while ensuring you receive the most out of the product's capabilities. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.
